name: Mad World MMO
summary:
Browser-based MMO developed in HTML5, that lets you play a fully-fledged MMORPG experience from any computer.

Whilst offering PvE raiding commanding strategy, dynamic boss encounters, competitive PvP environments and other characteristics widely accompanied in traditional MMOs, the development of the game will put a core focus on combat and massively multiplayer experiences. In contrast, Mad World's grim dark setting, gameplay and narrative seek to rediscover the emotional experiences.
